entry.title: Gerrit's Broadway on Wheels Strawberry Licorice - 5.29oz
entry.summary:
Vendor: Gerrit J. Verburg Candy
Type: Candy
Price: 3.99

Perfect for the Ultimate Strawberry Licorice-Lover!

     Any fan of licorice will love Gerrit's Broadway on Wheels Strawberry Licorice! Made with juicy strawberry flavour, these Italian-made treats are delicious and will warm your belly and heart. Whether you unravel the chewy, sweet strawberry licorice wheel and eat it bit by bit or take one big bite right out of the side of the wheel, this classic candy will always taste fresh and scrumptious!

 

5.29oz / 150g | 1 peg bag

entry.title: Sour Punch Cherry Straws - 2 oz.
entry.summary:
Vendor: American Licorice
Type: Candy
Price: 1.69

Sour licorice candy straws with a punch!

Candy from the 90s

Sour cherry is a favourite flavour that is used in a number of sweet treats. Thanks to its sweet flavour, it is often undercut by just a bit of tartness for a more complex flavour. With the Sour Punch Cherry Straws, you can enjoy the taste of cherry with the tartness of sour candy flavour crystals that eventually dissolve away as you chew to leave behind that classic fruity taste. The texture of this sour candy from the 90s is chewy and soft, helping the flavour to last longer with each bite. Sour Punch Cherry Straws is both a kosher and halal candy to make them okay for almost many dietary lifestyles Enjoy them either in a single pack or stock up with a 24-count box for the pantry.

  • American Candy
  • Nostalgic Candy from the 90s
  • Halal
  • Kosher

2 oz. Pack 

The Freshest Sour Candy Shipped Fast!

Ingredients:

Corn Syrup, Wheat Flour, Sugar, Lactose, Citric Acid, Malic Acid, Tartaric Acid, Glyceryl Monostearate, Glycerine, Artificial Flavors, Color Added (Including Red 40).

Allergen Information: Contains Wheat

Ingredients and nutritional information provided by the manufacturer and considered accurate at the time of posting. Refer to product labelling or contact the manufacturer directly for current data.

entry.title: Sour Punch Rainbow Straws - 2 oz.
entry.summary:
Vendor: American Licorice
Type: Candy
Price: 1.69

Sour licorice candy straw with a rainbow punch!

Candy from the 90s

A rainbow of flavours is waiting for you to enjoy with these Sour Punch Rainbow Straws. Instead of confining yourself to only one fruity flavour variety of Sour Punch straws, you can experience a burst of vibrant and diverse flavours with each bite. The straws feature bright citrus, blue raspberry and cherry flavours that will make each bite a tangy and flavourful one. Covered in the sour flavour crystals, they have a mouth-puckering feel that will eventually dissolve into that sweet flavour. These Sour Punch Rainbow Straws are both kosher and halal candy. Get either a single pack or stock up with a 24-count box!

  • Halal

The classic taste of slightly tart, slightly sweet strawberry is a popular one that we all love. entry.title: Sour Punch Watermelon Straws - 2 oz.
entry.summary:
Vendor: American Licorice
Type: Candy
Price: 1.69

Sour candy straws with a watermelon punch!

Candy from the 90s

Sour Punch Straws are a popular candy from the 90s and they have yet to lose their popularity. Even now, all of the many flavours they come in make them an enticing American candy that is still commonly purchased today. These Sour Punch Watermelon Straws take that classic chewy texture of this candy and infuse it with the lightly sweet, refreshing and summery taste of watermelon flavour for an excitingly vibrant and delicious flavour option. They are both halal and kosher, making them ideal for diets of most kinds. You can choose to get the Sour Punch Watermelon Straws in either a single pack or stock up with a 24-count box that will help you save plenty of money on the treats.
